revision.text:
{{Use dmy dates|date=May 2018}} {{Use Indian English|date=May 2018}} {{Infobox settlement | name = Tentha | native_name = | native_name_lang = | other_name = | nickname = | settlement_type = Village | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | pushpin_map = India Manipur#India | pushpin_label_position = left | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Manipur, India | coordinates = {{coord|24.58|N|93.98|E|display=inline,title}} | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|India}} | subdivision_type1 = [[States and territories of India|State]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Manipur]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of districts of India|District]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Thoubal district|Thoubal]] | established_title = <!-- Established --> | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | government_type = | governing_body = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_rank = | area_total_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_total = 6704 | population_as_of = 2001 | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_footnotes = | demographics_type1 = Languages | demographics1_title1 = Official | demographics1_info1 = [[Meiteilon]] (Manipuri) | timezone1 = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] | utc_offset1 = +5:30 | postal_code_type = [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] | postal_code = 795148 | area_code_type = Telephone code | area_code = 03848 | registration_plate = MN | website = {{URL|manipur.gov.in}} | footnotes = }}
'''Tentha''' is a village in [[Thoubal District]] in [[Manipur]], India.<ref name="2011 Census">{{cite web |title=Tentha |url=http://www.censusindia.gov.in/pca/SearchDetails.aspx?Id=305571 |website=[[2011 Census of India]] |publisher=[[Government of India]] |accessdate=14 September 2017 |archiveurl=https://archive.today/20170914185958/http://www.censusindia.gov.in/pca/SearchDetails.aspx?Id=305571 |archivedate=14 September 2017 |url-status=dead |df=dmy-all }}</ref>
==About Tentha== It is one of the large village in Thobal district. It is surrounded by Wabgai south-west, north by Ikop lake and East by Wangjing and north-east by [[Khangabok]].
==Demographics== {{As of|2001}} India [[census]],<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.censusindia.gov.in/Population_Finder/Population_Finder.aspx?Name=tentha&Criteria=V|title=Census data|website=www.censusindia.gov.in}}</ref> Tentha had a population of 6704. Males and females population are 3340 and 3364 respectively.
==Localities in Tentha== Name of localities(Leikai) in Tentha are:- * Tentha Thambal Chingya * Tentha Khunjao Makha Leikai * Tentha Mayai Leika * Tentha Mathak Leikai * Tentha Tuwabal * Tentha Khongbal * Tentha Heibung * Tentha Khunou * Tentha Marongband
==Economy== Majority of the peoples in this village are practice agriculture. Tentha is famous for the production of fish in Thoubal district.
==Connectivity== There are 3 important inter-village roads which is connected Tentha with other part of the district they are * Wangjing Tentha road * Samaram via Tentha Marongband road * Tekcham-Chingtham via Tentha Marongband road * Khangabok Tentha Road & * Wabagai Tentha
==Politics== Wangjing Tentha assembly constituency (Assembly Constituency No. 34) is part of [[Outer Manipur (Lok Sabha constituency)]].<ref>{{cite web |url = http://archive.eci.gov.in/se2002/background/S14/Dist_PC_AC.pdf |title = Assembly Constituencies - Corresponding Districts and Parliamentary Constituencies |work = Manipur |publisher = Election Commission of India }}{{Dead link|date=June 2018 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=no }}</ref>
==See also== * [[Moirangthem Nara]]
